attributes.action: make smoking and drug abuse while pregnant a criminal offence and for more help to give up smoking while pregnant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once a baby is 4 weeks in the womb it is already developing fast, smoking and drug missuse are already harmfull for an adult so imagine what it will be doing to the tiny feotus inside. It increases the risk of miscarrage, Premature Labour,lower birth weight and in extreme cases mental and serious health problems. More help should also be done to encourage women to get help giving up, not just a leaflet with a number to call. Please sign this petition and get something done!
